title: Evergreen and Nature View bid for landscaping

content.prompt: Evergreen and Nature View are bidding for a landscaping contract. The payoff matrix above shows what each firm’s total weekly profits from all its operations will be for each combination of bids. The first entry in each cell shows Evergreen’s profit, and the second entry in each cell shows Nature View’s profit. A Nash equilibrium results under which of the following conditions?

choices.label: When Evergreen bids low, no matter what Nature View’s bid is
When both firms bid high and when both firms bid low
When Evergreen bids high and Nature View bids low

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
